title: Assignment groups
description:
i. SIS -  'Student Information System', group is SIS Help Desk, this team deals with Powerschool issues 
ii. SSA: 'System Security Admin', this team deals with second level account issue 
iii.App Admin (Desktop) - This team deals with Brightspace issues 
iv. MWD - 'Mobile and Web Development', This team deals with EMA and TDSB connects issues.

title: Using CSD CSD
description:
i. Ask for the Student number before offering support. 
ii. If a parent does not know the student's number, ask for a name, the ticket should populate student information with the name. 
iii. If nothing comes up search for the student in SAMS or PowerSchool to get the student number or ask the parent or student how their name is spelled. 
iv. ONLY time it is okay to use CSD CSD is if the caller has no connection to TDSD i.e. a student from another board. Parents and Students need a valid student number to get help. 
v. Teachers and Student Teachers should be redirected to CSD for assistance.

title: Hardware tickets
description:
i. Make sure the room number and Chromebook serial number is in the ticket. 
ii. Sometimes teacher will put the serial number on description section, copy and paste to short description and configuration item section. 
iii. Ticket will automatically assign to Field Support.

title: Templates
description:
These are the templates I personally use in tickets.

While resolving a ticket: 
Hello,
We appreciate you reaching out to School Community IT Support! 
If you require further assistance, don't hesitate to contact us during our operating hours: 
School Community IT Support: 416-396-9100 
Monday-Friday, 8am-4pm. 
Thank you. 

Chromebook powerwash and reset steps: 
Hello, 
please, follow these steps to resolve the issue. 
Powerwash or Reset a Chromebook: https://tdsb.service-now.com/sp?id=kb_article&sysparm_article=KB0000555 
Chromebook Won't Turn On or Won't Charge: https://tdsb.service-now.com/sp?id=kb_article&sysparm_article=KB0003398 
If the issue remains, contact us back. 
Thank you
